To be able to have a fair comparison between all statistics over time, we do not include the partial data for year of 2016 and only include all data from 2010 to 2015 in the summary.

The following is a summary for the 311 calls in NYC during the past 6 years. The number of 311 calls shown in this summary has the following dimensions:

  * Agency
  * ZIP Code
  * Date
  * Hour of day (0-23)
  * Day of week
  * Month of year
  * Year
